entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Fort Albany
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:55 a.m. EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Freezing rain and a few flurries ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. A few flurries beginning near noon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning and afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
